post:
Our Network:
All of these Dedicated Servers are located in our Manchester, UK datacenter. This spot makes our services a uncomparable solution for those people and businesses who need to serve data to their clients/visitors all over the world.

Our network is powered by a high-speed Cisco core, with an emphasis on stability and redundancy. Our datacenter has access to multiple major bandwidth providers, and have contracts with many of them to provide the best speed and uptime to our customers. High-speed Cisco cabinet switches connect into multiple cores to provide redundant paths to all customer servers, eliminating many downtime issues due to core maintenance.

What you can expect:

  • Free Reboots
  • Powerfull Servers at low prices!
  • Free Control Panel Installation
  • Full Root Access
  • Server hardened when delivered
  • Manchester, UK Datacenter



We have also 1GBPS 100TB Dedicated servers AVAILABLE located in our both UK & US Locations - Click HERE TO VIEW DETAILS

Q: How long does it take to setup these dedicated servers?
A: We manually review every order before the provision. These UK based dedicated servers take 72 hours once the first payment has been received, other services may take different time depends on type of service. If you're 1st time ordering service, services setup may take longers as you have to be verified 1st time via our billing department before service provision.



Q. Can I host friends?
A. Yes, you may host your friends.

Q. Are there any hidden costs, or setup fees?
A. No.

Q: Can you help transfer our data?
A: Actually we can do this as long as you have the data in a cPanel or DirectAdmin VPS.
Q: Where are your virtual servers located?
A: These Dedicated Servers are housed in our Manchester, UK Datacenter.
